Uses of Class
tools.TwoPoint

  • Packages that use TwoPoint 
    Package Description
    app  
    app.cmd  
    ui  
    ui.io  

    • Uses of TwoPoint in app

      Methods in app with parameters of type TwoPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ControlUnit.execute(TwoPoint info)
      Adds to log current image of MyImage first if logging is true.

    • Uses of TwoPoint in app.cmd

      Methods in app.cmd with parameters of type TwoPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DrawEllipse.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint area)
      Draws an ellipse based on area's getRectagnle() to MyImage object.
      Due to Graphics2D draw method it may not paint very small areas like 1x1.
      void FillEllipse.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint area)
      Draws an ellipse based on area's getRectangle() to img.
      void ReplaceColor.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint point)
      Finds all pixels of same color as point's current values are pointing to and replaces their color by img's current color.
      void FillColor.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint point)
      Fills an area using breadth search starting from current values of point to img.
      void SetAvgColor.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint area)
      Calculates average color based on area's getRectangle() and sets it onto img.
      void FillRect.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint area)
      Fills a rectangle based on area's getRectangle() to img.
      void DrawRect.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint area)
      Draws a rectangle based on area's getRectangle() to img.
      void DrawLine.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint area)
      Draws a line based on area to img.
      void CMD.execute(MyImage img, TwoPoint area) 

    • Uses of TwoPoint in ui

      Constructors in ui with parameters of type TwoPoint 
      Constructor and Description
      PaintPanel(MyImage image, TwoPoint toolTip) 

    • Uses of TwoPoint in ui.io

      Methods in ui.io that return TwoPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TwoPoint MouseGuy.getToolTip()
